plays.text: Goal scored by Sergei Nemchinov assisted by Jim McKenzie and Randy McKay
Penalty to Todd Warriner 2 minutes for Hooking Patrik Elias
Goal scored by Todd Bertuzzi assisted by Brendan Morrison

Penalty to Matt Cooke 2 minutes for Hooking Scott Stevens

Penalty to Jarkko Ruutu 2 minutes for Holding Scott Stevens
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for High Sticking Mattias Ohlund
Goal scored by Trevor Linden assisted by Brent Sopel and Mattias Ohlund
Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Tripping Jarkko Ruutu
Penalty to Mattias Ohlund 2 minutes for Interference Jay Pandolfo
Penalty to Jim McKenzie 2 minutes for Tripping Artem Chubarov
Penalty to Valeri Kamensky 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Peter Skudra
Goal scored by Mattias Ohlund assisted by Todd Bertuzzi
